name: Niki Ross
text: We appreciate the "contactless" delivery. A simple text or a knock on the door would have been appreciated. Our food was left sitting on a chair in the side of the driveway unbeknownst to us food was even delivered. Had to reheat food in …More

name: Dhanush Naika
text: Good service!

name: Kat Roeser
text: For some reason, pizza was just slightly off last night. Still good, but not the usual great for some reason. Could have been me!  Wings were larger than usual, which was fantastic!  Sometimes they are very tiny!

name: Kevin Morrow
text: I ordered the pizza online around 10am for delivery at noon. The pizza arrived at 12:15p and was very dry and not very warm. I called the store and they offered to give me a credit for a free pizza. I hope the next one is much better.

name: Erin Monnett
text: Pizza came earlier then the quote time, actually had the extra sauce & cheese we paid extra for, it was hot when arrived, super yummy!

name: JKD D
text: LOVE the stuffed crust. Excellent service.

name: Michelle Robinson
text: Try getting the order correct. And answer the phones when they try to inform! And reply when someone sends a complaint! Make calling with an incorrect order easier to do.

name: Shelly Chelle
text: Have my food delivered faster. I got a free pizza for the delay so I would still recommend Pizza Hut to my friends/family.

name: S S
text: Contactless Delivery was easy and pizza & wings were perfect!

name: Jim - Patty Ritz
text: The pizza was good, but the pan pizza's seem to be  a little greasy

name: Calvin Frank
text: pizza was overcooked and very dry.  Lack of sauce and overcooking in oven plus had to remind them I was outside for delivery.

name: Kelly Huffman
text: The garlic parm wings were excellent.

name: Matt Moskala
text: The pizza was great but the breadsticks were a little soft and undercooked.

name: Stephen Strome
text: Had a problem with this last order. The app suggested that a store an hour away was only 0.77 miles from my house. The pizza went to Fairfield and I live and work near Dayton. I tried to call and cancel, but nobody picked up the phone. The …More

name: Sandra Bowling
text: I ordered 2 medium pizza both different one with extra sauce and the wrong pizza had it

name: Karen Salyers
text: Excellent pizza, terrific service!

name: Ja Pat
text: Nice distribution and density of toppings

name: carol fortener
text: I have never had to wait and the price is great and the pizza tastes delicious !

name: CHERYL SMITH
text: It was exactly as expected.

name: Joseph
text: The pizza crust and toppings were dry and stale.

name: Meikaline Woods
text:
I am vegetarian.
Positivity first -
They have fresh mushrooms instead of from a can. …More

name: Lucy Jones
text: By far the fastest delivery I’ve ever experienced with a pizza shop. It’s always hot and fresh when my food arrives, too. If you haven’t tried it yet, I suggest giving their chicken Alfredo pasta pan a try. It’s amazing!

name: Tausha Jones
text: The pizza was very over cooked!

name: Akash Patel
text: I have yet to get a anything wrong from this place and its been 9 years, even if i got something wrong they immediately corrected it and cant think of anything bad to say

name: Emma Halle
text: 2 kids and I shared a large pizza while biking around the city. Frankly, I didn't expect much but was pleasantly surprised. Pizza had a nice crust, both crisp and chewy. Plenty of sauce that was not a sweet as usual and enough cheese to satisfy my kids as well. Will definitely go back again.

name: sharee milrot
text: Excellent pizza

name: Kyle Ranta
text: I order pizza from this establishment all the time, at least twice a month. The pizza is always good. Although the cheesy bread does not hold up to the standards of my past pizza hut experiences. I'm not sure if corporate cut back on the amount of cheese allotted, or if the employees just don't know how to make it properly.

name: Leslie Walker
text: Good pizza!  Fast delivery!

name: ghost kitties
text: Only PH I've been to where the pizza is great NOT greasy.

name: Bret Schoening
text: Pizza was over done. Cinnabon rolls were burned. Boneless wings had all of 2 tablespoons of sauce. Barely enough to have a drop on each wing. To add to this the staff was entirely incompetent. Except for the driver. He should have been the manager.

name: Justin Corbin
text: Absolutely loved their fries and boneless chicken wings.

name: James Weathers
text: Quality of the pizza

name: Daniel Gillahan
text: Loved salida bar and pizza.

name: Vickie Metzler
text: I really like their pizza

name: Sanda I
text: Very nice place. The young man is great

name: Brendon Sanders
text: Called and rerouted to "the call center" took my bank acct info. I never recieved my order and the local store had no record of it. Hope they dont empty my bank account!! Do not provide Credit Card Information.

name: Thomas Fulton
text: Wrong pizza, poor service. 50 different pizza options in town, PICK ANOTHER PLACE.

name: Dustin parr
text: The hut! Love the deals here. Good pizza at a great price.

name: Hemant Pathak
text: Great experience picking up an order.

name: Alana Hammersmith
text: Ordered a pizza, 2 hours later it's not here, my account was charged and the store is now closed.  Worst Pizza place ever.

name: Arun Aggarwal
text: Poor service. Pizza dropped off. New pizza got made with no marinara sauce. No customer care or service

name: Hollie Spencer
text: I used to love pizza hut. I am very disappointed in my order. The pizza I ordered was terrible! It had no flavor, I asked for extra sauce and was given none. The wings were okay, the delivery lady was nice but the pizza was just terrible!.

name: Thomas Boling
text: Will never order from this place again. Tried to order a personal pan meal, and was told I needed to order online. Told the guy that the app was not working properly because it was not updated to iOS11. They refused to give me service. So, …More

name: ToDD White
text: These guys are great. Food was good too!

name: Shaheera Afzal
text: This location always took forever with deliveries. The pizza and food would be lukewarm by the time they got it to me. I thought it was maybe the one bad incident, but it happened several times and then I just gave up.

name: Yvette Steens Kaelbl
text: If you want a cheap night out and not cooking looking for good Pizza they make good food

name: Dennis Sutton
text: Good pizza

name: Laurie Peacock
text: Large pepperoni and onion, thin crust.  8 slices, 10 pepperoni, sliver of onion on each piece.  It was like eating a plain saltine. We used to go to the restaurant at whip and 48 before it went downhill years ago, and were  hoping the  carryout was better.

name: Thomas Obrien
text: I love there pizzas and breadsticks and chocolate chip cookies

name: Aneasha Ellis
text: Food was great love there pasta

name: THE BOSS
text:
Staff was okay one guy seemed high
And the place was a mess

text: Food is fine, INCAPABLE of getting orders right.

name: Shellie Adams
text: Nice staff, great food

name: Eric S.

text: Pizza hut pan pizza is God's gift to mankind
